t: How to Get Amazon Brand Approval Without a Trademark in 2024: A Step-by-Step Guide
s: To start, Log in to your Amazon Seller account and navigate to the “Add Products” section from the catalog. t: Requirements and tips for enrolling a brand in Amazon Brand Registry - Sell on Amazon
s: June 4, 2024 - To enroll a brand in Brand Registry, your brand must have an active registered trademark or a pending trademark registration. That trademark must be a text-based mark (word mark) or an image-based mark with words, letters, or numbers (design mark) from approved government intellectual property ...

t: Amazon Brand Registry | Sell on Amazon
s: No. You can create a single, global account with Brand Registry. During enrollment, you’ll only be able to select a single country-based trademark office. But you’ll be able add trademarks for the offices of other countries after your enrollment has been approved.
